content: flower patch baby blanket jane thompson 2019 this warm bobble blanket will make an ideal travel companion for baby in the buggy or in the car materials you will need 1436 yards 1313 metres dk yarn 4mm hook yarn needle for sewing in ends finished size 85 x 100 cm abbreviations chain chain double_crochet double_crochet make bobble mb slip_stitch slip_stitch stitch/es st/s yarn over hook yo the pattern is written using uk terminology about bobbles the bobbles are made from the wrong side of the work this way they stay in place and don t try to pop themselves inwards to make a bobble *yo insert hook into next st and pull up a loop yo pull through two* repeat from * to * into the same stitch until you have 5 loops on the hook yo and pull through all 5 loops the next stitch you make in this pattern a double_crochet will anchor the bobble jane thompson 2019 pattern start by making 136 chain row 1 double_crochet into second chain from hook then make 1 double_crochet into each chain to the end 1 chain and turn row 2-5 1 double_crochet into each st to end 1 chain and turn row 6 1 double_crochet into each of the first 6 sts *mb 1 double_crochet mb 1 double_crochet into each of the next 17 sts* repeat from * to * until you have made a total of 6 sets of 2 bobbles along the row then mb 1 double_crochet mb 1 double_crochet into next 6 sts chain 1 and turn row 7 1 double_crochet
